sn49.35-44:1: "Tisso imā, bhikkhave, esanā. Katamā tisso? Kāmesanā, bhavesanā, brahmacariyesanā – imā kho, bhikkhave, tisso esanā. Imāsaṁ kho, bhikkhave, tissannaṁ esanānaṁ abhiññāya pariññāya parikkhayāya pahānāya cattāro sammappadhānā bhāvetabbā.
sn49.35-44:2: Esanā vidhā āsavo,Bhavo ca dukkhatā tisso;Khilaṁ malañca nīgho ca,Vedanā taṇhā tasinā cāti.
